title: Clement Maosa welcomes his baby boy
text:
Clement Maosa welcomes his baby boy share this





Earlier this month Clement Maosa celebrated the countdown to the welcoming of his first child with an intimate baby shower and now he’s arrived!

Taking to his Instagram account, the 31-year-old shared an adorable snap of his son’s hand clutching his finger.

“The Blessings of God comes in different seasons, sights, kinds, colors, shapes and forms. All I know is that I am extremely blessed and highly favoured,” he captioned the post.

Read more: PIC: Davido welcomes his first son

Clement, who revealed the exciting news that he is going to be a dad earlier this year with a gorgeous baby announcement photoshoot, received congratulatory messages from his followers including fellow celebrities, actress Rami Chuene and Kay Sibiya.

“Congratulations to you #PapagoPoy”, commented Rami.

“Congratulations brother...you are truly blessed,” added Kay Sibiya.
description: Skeem Saam actor Clement Maosa and his fiancée recently welcomed their first son together.
